name: Sixes
description: Sixes is a puzzle game that asks you to think three-dimensionally. Each puzzle asks you to manoeuvre your dice to the correct position with the correct dice side pointing upwards. However, you must do this in a limited amount of turns, or you will lose a life. Lose all your lives, and you are back to the beginning—a puzzle roguelike. Don't worry once you figure out a puzzle; you can get through them quickly. We want you to take your time and figure out these puzzles. Made by father and son team David and Luke for the GMTK2022 Game Jam.
